options.text: I actually not able to fly.
options.dialog:
#Mipa
Sadly, you are right, I am not able to fly.
I think soil drift is only option for me.

options.text: If only I were a pretty bee like you, then I would be able to!
options.dialog:
#Mipa_2
If only I were a pretty bee like you...
I would be able to!
#Jobee
!?
A..uh...Well I am appreciate your compliment.
Anything more you would like to ask?

options.text: No, I am ready to head out to soil drift!
options.dialog:
#Mipa_4
No, I am ready to head out to soil drift!

#Mipa
What honey pie taste like?
#Jobee
I am surprised that this is the thing you actually ask.
#Jobee
Well it's sweet and doughy, but not sweet as sugar..
Wait why you even ask?
#Mipa_3
Just curious.

options.text: I guess, it's time for me to move to soil drift.
options.dialog:
#Mipa_4
It's was nice to talk to you.
#Mipa
But It's time for me to move to soil drift.
#Jobee
Alright then.

options.text: Are all bee queens are such tall and fluffy as you are?
options.dialog:
#Mipa
Are all bee queens are such tall and fluffy as you are?
#Jobee
Oh, Mipa, I glad that you noticed, but I guess, each bee queen looks that way, it's just ordinary.
By the way just call me Jobee, not the queen.
#Mipa_4
Okay, Jobee.
#Mipa
But anyway...
#Mipa_2
I Think you look good.
#Jobee
Mummh, stop it.
#Mipa
Okay, Jobee it's was nice to talk to you, but I think it's time for me to go to soil drift.
#Jobee
Ummm... wait!
#Mipa
?!
#Jobee
I think, I can help you to fly through the drippers cave.
#Mipa
!!!??
#Mipa
But how?
#Jobee
Just come closer.
